name: SingletonMap_putTest
description: Unit tests for the put method of SingletonMap, focusing on behavior with matching and non-matching keys.

test_cases.name: testPutWithMatchingKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method of SingletonMap with a matching key, ensuring the old value is returned and the new value is set.

test_cases.name: testPutWithNonMatchingKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method of SingletonMap with a non-matching key, ensuring an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
